metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3219 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: GnuPG can be made to spin on a relatively small input by (for example) crafting a public key with thousands of signatures attached, compressed down to just a few KB.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per the upstream gnupg bug, the change will not be applied as of 2022-09-28, proposed patch has not been accepted by upstream developers

criterions.comment: gnupg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gnupg2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
